mapper.select: SELECT z.* FROM( select ROWNUM AS rn, c.*, f.* from (SELECT a.pay_id, a.pay_date, a.cos_term, a.pay_way, a.pay_refund, a.pay_sum, b.les_nm, b.les_id FROM pay a, Lesson b WHERE a.les_id = b.les_id AND a.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY a.pay_date DESC) c, (SELECT sum(e.lidx_curtime)as les_total, d.les_id as les_id2 FROM lesson_index d, index_time e where e.user_id=#{userId}and d.lidx_id = e.lidx_id GROUP BY d.les_id) f where c.les_id = f.les_id2)z WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page} -1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND #{page} * #{pageSize}

select ab.*,cd.* from( (select a.pay_id, a.pay_date, a.pay_way, a.pay_sum, b.les_nm, b.les_id from pay a, lesson b where a.les_id = b.les_id and a.user_id=#{userId} and a.pay_id=#{payId}))ab, (SELECT sum(e.lidx_curtime)as les_total, d.les_id as les_id2 FROM lesson_index d, index_time e where e.user_id=#{userId} and d.lidx_id = e.lidx_id GROUP BY d.les_id)cd where ab.les_id = cd.les_id2
mapper.update: update pay set pay_refund ='Y' where pay_id=#{payId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point(POINT_ID,POINT_DATE,POINT_UPDATE,POINT_GN,POINT_SUM,USER_ID) VALUES('POINT'||LPAD(POINT_SEQ.nextval,4,'0'), SYSDATE, #{pointUpdate}, '3', (SELECT point_sum FROM( SELECT point_sum FROM POINT WHERE user_id=#{userId} order by point_date desc) a WHERE ROWNUM=1) + #{pointUpdate}, #{userId})
